B1 the activity in which people talk about something and tell each other their ideas or opinions: hold/have discussions with We will hold/have discussions with employee representatives about possible redundancies.under discussion The matter is still under discussion (= being considered). a discussion group/document
More examplesFewer examplesThere was some lively discussion at the meeting."Can we move on to the next item for discussion, please?"Management are having discussions with the union about possible redundancies.This discussion has raised many important issues.Her remarks on the employment question led to a heated discussion.
